description: Detects uncommon one-liner command having ping and copy at the same time, which is usually used by malware.
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious Ping/Copy Command Combination
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\cmd.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"Cmd.Exe")) AND (process.command_line.text:("*\ \-n\ *" OR "*\ \/n\ *") AND process.command_line.text:"*ping*" AND process.command_line.text:"*copy\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \/y\ *"))
